TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PackageRelationshipSelector extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines criteria to select part-level or package-level relationships.

remarks.format:
## Remarks PackageRelationshipSelector is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> method of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> class to specify a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts to be signed.
PackageRelationshipSelector is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> property of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> class to obtain a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts that have been signed with the given digital signature.

MemberSignature.Value: public PackageRelationshipSelector (Uri sourceUri, System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType selectorType, string selectionCriteria);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri sourceUri, valuetype System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType selectorType, string selectionCriteria) cil managed

Docs.param: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the or the (`SourceUri`="/") that owns the relationship.
The type of the `selectionCriteria`, either by relationship or relationship .
The qualification string that is used to select the relationships based on the `selectorType`.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.exception: The parameter is but is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xsd-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].
The is not the root ("/") and is also not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> Select(class System.IO.Packaging.Package package) cil managed

Docs.param: The package from which to select the relationships based on the selection criteria.
Docs.summary: Returns a list of objects that match the defined <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria%2A>.
Gets the selection criteria specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Docs.value: The selection criteria based on the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType%2A> of or specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

Docs.summary: Gets the specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Docs.value: The selector type of or specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

Docs.summary: Gets the root package URI ("/") or part <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
Docs.value: The root package URI ("/") or part <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
